statements: SELECT * FROM rewards
SELECT player_id, reward_points FROM rewards WHERE player_id = 123
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY last_update_date DESC
SELECT player_id, reward_points, last_update_date FROM rewards ORDER BY player_id ASC, reward_points DESC
SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_points > 500
SELECT player_id, reward_points, last_update_date FROM rewards WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY last_update_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT player_id, reward_points, last_update_date FROM rewards WHERE reward_points >= 50 AND last_update_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY reward_points ASC, last_update_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(reward_points) AS avg_points FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id HAVING avg_points > 75 ORDER BY avg_points DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_rewards FROM rewards GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_rewards >= 3 ORDER BY num_rewards DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerRewards LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, reward_points FROM PlayerRewards WHERE reward_points > 100
SELECT * FROM GamblingActivities WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT player_id, activity_date, activity_type FROM GamblingActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Slots' LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, activity_type, amount FROM GamblingActivities WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM PlayerRewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT player_id, reward_points FROM PlayerRewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerRewards WHERE reward_level = 'Gold' AND reward_points > 50;
SELECT player_id, reward_points, reward_level FROM PlayerRewards WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT reward_level FROM PlayerRewards ORDER BY reward_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_rewards;
SELECT player_id, reward_points, reward_level FROM player_rewards ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, reward_points FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT player_id, SUM(bet_amount) AS total_bets, SUM(win_amount) AS total_wins FROM gambling_activities GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, favorite_game FROM player_behavior WHERE total_wins > total_bets_placed;
SELECT * FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT player_id, reward_level FROM player_rewards ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_name, win_amount FROM gambling_activities WHERE win_amount > 500 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, favorite_game FROM player_behavior WHERE total_bets_placed > 10 AND total_wins > 5;
SELECT player_id, total_bets_placed, total_wins FROM player_behavior WHERE favorite_game = 'Blackjack';
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT reward_id, reward_type FROM rewards WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_details ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT game_name, bet_amount, bet_result FROM gambling_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM player_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'warning';
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC, reward_type ASC
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player_details WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01' AND join_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT player_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM player_behavior GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_activities > 10
SELECT player_id, SUM(bet_amount) AS total_bets FROM gambling_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2021-12-31' GROUP BY player_id
SELECT player_name, behavior_description FROM player_details pd JOIN player_behavior pb ON pd.player_id = pb.player_id WHERE pb.behavior_type = 'Feedback'
SELECT * FROM rewards;
SELECT player_id, reward_type, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE reward_amount > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT player_id, game_name, win_amount FROM gambling_activities WHERE win_amount > bet_amount;
SELECT reward_type, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_amount FROM player_rewards GROUP BY reward_type;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_amount DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_email, reward_type FROM players INNER JOIN player_rewards ON players.player_id = player_rewards.player_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(reward_amount) AS total_reward_amount FROM players LEFT JOIN player_rewards ON players.player_id = player_rewards.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT game_name, SUM(win_amount) AS total_win_amount FROM gambling_activities GROUP BY game_name HAVING total_win_amount > 1000;
